Package io.opentelemetry.metrics

This package describes the Metrics API that can be used to record application Metrics.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CounterDouble
    Counter metric, to report instantaneous measurement of a double value.
    CounterDouble.Builder
    Builder class for CounterDouble.
    CounterDouble.TimeSeries
    A TimeSeries for a CounterDouble.
    CounterLong
    Counter metric, to report instantaneous measurement of a long value.
    CounterLong.Builder
    Builder class for CounterLong.
    CounterLong.TimeSeries
    The value of a single point in the Cumulative.TimeSeries.
    GaugeDouble
    Gauge metric, to report instantaneous measurement of a double value.
    GaugeDouble.Builder
    Builder class for GaugeLong.
    GaugeDouble.TimeSeries
    A TimeSeries for a GaugeDouble.
    GaugeLong
    Gauge metric, to report instantaneous measurement of an long value.
    GaugeLong.Builder
    Builder class for GaugeLong.
    GaugeLong.TimeSeries
    The value of a single point in the Gauge.TimeSeries.
    Meter
    Entry point fot metrics API, this object allows to create new MetricRegistry.
    Metric<T>
    Base interface for all metrics defined in this package.
    Metric.Builder<B extends Metric.Builder<B,V>,V>  
    MetricRegistry
    Creates and manages a set of metrics for a library/application.
    MetricRegistry.Builder
    Builder class for the MetricRegistry.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LabelKey
    The key of a Label associated with a MetricDescriptor.
    LabelValue
    The value of a Label associated with a TimeSeries.
    Metrics
    Class for accessing the default Meter.
    NoopMetrics
    No-op implementations of metrics classes.
